thorwin.math.geo

Class AABB

  • java.lang.Object
    • thorwin.math.geo.AABB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class AABB
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An axis aligned box.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AABB

        public AABB(double minX,
            double maxX,
            double minY,
            double maxY,
            double minZ,
            double maxZ)
        Constructs a bounding box. Note that the min/max values should be sane (max should be greater than min).
        Parameters:
        minX - minimum x-coordinate
        maxX - maximum x-coordinate
        minY - minimum y-coordinate
        maxY - maximum y-coordinate
        minZ - minimum z-coordinate
        maxZ - maximum z-coordinate

    • Method Detail

        public static AABB valueOf(Vector3D... vertices)
        Creates a bounding box from a set of vertices.
        Parameters:
        vertices - the vertices (not null, 1 or more vertices required)
        Returns:
        The axis aligned bounding box
